Verification.title: Identity Verification
Verification.description: Complete your identity verification to unlock full access to Masumi.

errors.consentRequired: Please accept the consent to proceed
errors.tokenGenerationFailed: Failed to generate verification token. Please try again.

Intro.purpose: Identity verification is required for compliance and to enable agent monetization features. This helps us maintain trust and security across the platform.
Intro.gdpr: We follow GDPR principles and only collect the minimum data necessary for verification. Your data is processed securely and will be retained according to our privacy policy.
Intro.biometric: The verification process includes biometric checks (selfie and liveness detection) to ensure you are a real person matching your identity documents.
Intro.credential: Upon successful verification, a Veridian credential will be issued to your account. This credential enables you to use advanced features and can be shared with your consent.
Intro.consentLabel: I understand and consent to the identity verification process.

Verification.description: Please complete the verification steps below. You'll need to upload an identity document and take a selfie.
Verification.error: An error occurred during verification. Please try again.

Completion.successMessage: Your verification has been submitted successfully. We'll review it and notify you once it's complete.
Completion.processingMessage: Your verification is being processed. This may take a few moments.
Completion.rejectedMessage: Your verification was rejected. Please review the reason above and try again.

Agents.title: Agents
Agents.description: Manage your AI agents and their verification status.
Agents.noAgents: No agents found. Register your first agent to get started.
Agents.noAgentsMatchingSearch: No agents found matching your search
Agents.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This action cannot be undone.

Register.title: Register New Agent
Register.iconDescription: Choose an icon for your agent or upload a custom one.
Register.iconLoadError: Failed to load icon. Please check the URL and try again.
Register.name: Name
Register.nameMaxLength: Name must be less than 250 characters
Register.descriptionMaxLength: Description must be less than 1000 characters
Register.apiUrlInvalid: API URL must be a valid URL
Register.apiUrlProtocol: API URL must start with http:// or https://
Register.isFree: This is a free agent (no cost for interactions)
Register.termsOfUseUrlPlaceholder: Enter the terms of use URL
Register.error: Failed to register agent. Please try again.

Details.deleteDescription: Once you delete an agent there is no going back.
Details.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This action cannot be undone.

Earnings.title: Summary
Earnings.noEarningsData: No earnings data available in the selected period. Earnings will appear here once the agent receives payments.

pending.title: No Credential Issued
pending.description: This agent does not have a Veridian credential yet. Request a credential to link your verified KYC status to this agent.

review.title: Verification Under Review
review.description: Your verification request is being processed. This may take a few moments.

approved.title: Agent Verified
approved.description: This agent has been successfully verified with your KYC status.

verified.title: Agent Verified
verified.description: This agent has been successfully verified with a Veridian credential.

revoked.title: Credential Revoked
revoked.description: The credential for this agent has been revoked. You can request a new credential.

expired.title: Credential Expired
expired.description: The credential for this agent has expired. You can request a new credential.

rejected.title: Verification Rejected
rejected.description: Verification was rejected. You can try requesting verification again.

Verification.requestDescription: Review the information below and confirm to issue a Veridian credential for this agent.
Verification.kycStatusDescription: Your identity has been verified and approved.
Verification.kycStatusPendingDescription: Please complete your KYC verification first.
Verification.kycStatusReviewDescription: Your KYC verification is being processed.
Verification.kycStatusRejectedDescription: Your KYC verification was rejected. Please complete it again.
Verification.credentialDescription: A Veridian credential will be issued linking your verified KYC status to this agent. This credential can be used to verify the agent's authenticity.
Verification.requestError: Failed to issue credential. Please try again.
Verification.connectionNotEstablished: Connection not established. The credential server needs to know about your AID before issuing credentials.
Verification.connectionEstablished: Connection established. Ready to issue credentials.
Verification.establishConnectionDescription: To receive credentials, you need to establish a connection with the credential server. Scan the QR code below with your Veridian wallet to complete the connection.
Verification.scanIssuerQRCode: Scan this QR code with your Veridian wallet
Verification.failedToLoadIssuerOobi: Failed to load issuer connection QR code. Please try again.
Verification.connectionStillNotEstablished: Connection still not established. Please scan the QR code and try again.
Verification.failedToCheckConnection: Failed to check connection. Please try again.

VeridianWallet.scanQRCode: Scan QR code with Veridian Wallet
VeridianWallet.scanDescription: Open Veridian wallet on your mobile device and scan this QR code to connect
VeridianWallet.cantScan: Can't scan? Copy the connection ID:
VeridianWallet.connectionTimeout: Connection timeout. Please try scanning the QR code again.
